title: Jorma Kaukonen with Tom Hobson - Quah (1974; 2003) [FLAC]
description:
2003 CD re-issue of Jorma's solo debut album including the 1974 album plus four bonus tracks



Jorma Kaukonen with Tom Hobson - Quah
Format: CD/Album
Label: BMG Heritage / RCA 
Released: 2003
Original vinyl release 1974
Genre: Blues, Folk Blues
